thread.title: Samantha gets candid with fans | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: Samantha gets candid with fans | Deccan Chronicle

author: Deccan
title: Samantha gets candid with fans | Deccan Chronicle
text: Deccan Chronicle | October 23, 2015, 23.56 pm Samantha Though Paththu Enrathukulla starring Vikram and Samantha has opened to mixed reviews, seems like the latter is content with the response she has been receiving. That’s what the Kaththi actress said while interacting with her fans on her micro blogging page. When quizzed by an admirer of hers about pulling off the role of a tribal warrior, which has a negative shade, Sam said it was fun playing an evil character and that it came out better than she expected. The actress also revealed a preference for a few of her co-stars, favourite actors and unknown facets of her career. When asked about her favourite among contemporaries, pat came the reply, ‘Trisha’. Samantha also said that she has an interesting role to play in Vijay59 and that it was a fan girl moment for her when she acted along with Ilayathalapathy in Kaththi. Pinning all hopes on other upcoming films 24, Brahmotsavam, Thanga Magan, etc, she described Tollywood director Trivikram Srinivas as her best friend.
